description:
Prepare yourself for numerous new
levels in five stunning locations. Pull
off insane stunts on top of
skyscrapers, speed down busy
highways and take an intense ride
through the suburbs while competing
with others to get to the top of the
leaderboards!

Raise the bar by making the highest
jumps or the most head-spinning flips
in Stunt Mode! Try Time Attack and
beat the best time at neck-breaking
speeds! Take on the Challenge levels
to test your skills!

Create your own unique levels in the
Track Editor and share them with
friends!

Still not enough thrills? Then try
downloading more player-made tracks
for endless replayability!
name: Urban Trial Freestyle 2
